Posts.Content: knitterkjv wrote: Can someone suggest an estrogen blocker after radiation that doesn't have many side effects and won't cause weight gain. I am 66. Dx 6/2012, IDC, 1cm, Stage I, Grade 2, 1/2 nodes, ER+/PR-, HER2- Surgery 8/12/2012 Lumpectomy: Right; Lymph node removal: Right, Sentinel Chemotherapy 9/25/2012 Cytoxan (cyclophosphamide), Taxotere (docetaxel) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Estrogen blocking meds after radiation knitterkjv MMSS
